sentences.text: It was originally scheduled to take place in 2021, four years after the 2017 World Baseball Classic|previous event, but was canceled in May 2020, as a result of the Impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on sports|COVID-19 pandemic. It was later announced that 2023 World Baseball Classic qualification|qualifications for the Classic would start in September 2022, as agreed by World Baseball Classic Inc. (WBCI) The tournament expanded from 16 to 20 national teams, with all teams that participated in the 2017 World Baseball Classic|2017 edition automatically qualifying, plus four additional spots. Unlike in 2009 World Baseball Classic rosters|2009, 2013 World Baseball Classic rosters|2013 and 2017 World Baseball Classic rosters|2017, the U.S. lineup attracted some distinguished players and attracted significant attention for the tournament.

references.text: <ref name="Canceled">{{cite web |title=2021 World Baseball Classic canceled; event may not return until 2023, report says |url=https://www.cbssports.com/mlb/news/2021-world-baseball-classic-canceled-event-may-not-return-until-2023-report-says/ |website=CBS Sports |date=May 11, 2020 |access-date=February 3, 2021 |archive-date=November 26, 2020 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20201126103656/https://www.cbssports.com/mlb/news/2021-world-baseball-classic-canceled-event-may-not-return-until-2023-report-says/ |url-status=live }}</ref>

sentences.text: Japan won their record-extending third title after defeating defending champions United States 3–2 in the 2023 World Baseball Classic championship|championship game, becoming the second team since the Dominican Republic national baseball team|Dominican Republic in the 2013 World Baseball Classic to win the WBC with an undefeated record. Shohei Ohtani was named the World Baseball Classic Most valuable player|Most Valuable Player.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |title=World Baseball Classic: Shohei Ohtani awarded WBC MVP after closing out championship in Japan's win over USA |url=https://www.cbssports.com/mlb/news/world-baseball-classic-shohei-ohtani-awarded-wbc-mvp-after-closing-out-championship-in-japans-win-over-usa/ |access-date=March 22, 2023 |website=CBSSports.com |date=March 22, 2023 |language=en |archive-date=March 22, 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230322031240/https://www.cbssports.com/mlb/news/world-baseball-classic-shohei-ohtani-awarded-wbc-mvp-after-closing-out-championship-in-japans-win-over-usa/ |url-status=live }}</ref>

sentences.text:
A qualifying tournament was scheduled for March 2020 in Tucson, Arizona, United States, to determine the last four teams. The qualification tournament ended up postponing to September 16–21, 2022, for the 2023 World Baseball Classic qualification#Pool A|Africa/Europe qualifiers and September 30 – October 5, 2022, for the 2023 World Baseball Classic qualification#Pool B|Americas/Asia/Oceania qualifiers.

To allow 'Previous best appearance' to be sorted, the following nominal values have been ascribed to performances in the tournament;
Winners=1, Runners-up=2, Third place=3, Fourth place=4 To sort, please input the following before the text: 'data-sort-value="x"|'.-->

references.text: <ref name="sportbusiness"/> Twelve teams were split into two pools, and the top two teams in each pool would qualify.<ref name=expanded/> On March 12, 2020, Major League Baseball announced that the qualifying tournaments were being postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.<ref>{{cite web | url=https://www.mlb.com/press-release/press-release-major-league-baseball-to-delay-2020-opening-day-by-at-least-two-we | title=Major League Baseball to delay 2020 Opening Day by at least two weeks | work=MLB.com Press Release | date=March 12, 2020 | accessdate=May 19, 2020 | archive-date=May 19, 2020 | archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20200519095637/https://www.mlb.com/press-release/press-release-major-league-baseball-to-delay-2020-opening-day-by-at-least-two-we | url-status=live }}</ref>

sentences.text: The pool draw was announced by World Baseball Classic Inc. (WBCI) on July 7, 2022. Organizers prioritized placement in separate pools of the four nations which reached the semifinals of the 2017 WBC (Japan, the Netherlands, Puerto Rico, and the United States) and the three hosts (Japan, the United States, and Taiwan). Remaining pool assignments were made based on WBSC World Rankings, competitive balance, and commercial and geographic interest.

<ref>{{cite tweet |user=WBCBaseball |number=1545093330207494149 |title=Taichung, Tokyo, Phoenix, and Miami are ready! Here is the official tournament format for the #WorldBaseballClassic 2023. |date=July 7, 2022}}</ref>

sentences.text: The first round of the tournament drew 1,010,999 fans across all four venues, nearly double the previous record for the WBC. This included 361,976 fans in Tokyo for Pool B and 295,850 fans in Miami for Pool D. Total attendance for the tournament across all rounds was 1,306,414, the highest in WBC history.

sentences.text:
{{Main|2023 World Baseball Classic rosters}}
Participating nations had to submit their final 30-man rosters no later than February 7, 2023. WBC rules required teams to carry at least 14 pitchers and two catchers on their rosters.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |title=2023 World Baseball Classic rules and regulations |url=https://www.mlb.com/news/world-baseball-classic-rules-and-regulations-2023 |website=MLB.com |access-date=February 7, 2023 |archive-date=February 7, 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230207114949/https://www.mlb.com/news/world-baseball-classic-rules-and-regulations-2023 |url-status=live }}</ref>

sentences.text: On March 7, 2023, Major League Baseball and the World Baseball Softball Confederation released the list of officials for the tournament.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |title=List of umpires for the 2023 World Baseball Classic |date=March 7, 2023 |url=https://dknation.draftkings.com/mlb/2023/3/7/23627959/wbc-umpires-2023-world-baseball-classic-pools-knockout-stage-championship-round-who-are-they |publisher=DraftKings |access-date=March 8, 2023 |archive-date=March 8, 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230308063133/https://dknation.draftkings.com/mlb/2023/3/7/23627959/wbc-umpires-2023-world-baseball-classic-pools-knockout-stage-championship-round-who-are-they |url-status=live }}</ref>

sentences.text: The prize money allocation was released by Major League Baseball and the World Baseball Softball Confederation on March 7, 2023. Teams collected prize money for each stage they qualified in. The champions could collect a maximum of $3 million if they were a pool winner.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |title=2023 World Baseball Classic: Format, rosters, schedule, rules for international tournament |url=https://www.cbssports.com/mlb/news/2023-world-baseball-classic-format-rosters-schedule-rules-for-international-tournament/ |work=CBS Sports |access-date=March 8, 2023 |archive-date=March 7, 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230307223322/https://www.cbssports.com/mlb/news/2023-world-baseball-classic-format-rosters-schedule-rules-for-international-tournament/ |url-status=live }}</ref>

sentences.text: The Japan-South Korea pool B game drew a household viewership of 44.4% in Japan The broadcast averaged 29.9 million Japanese viewers) and 2.7 million Korean viewers. The Korean rating in that game was the second-most-watched WBC game in South Korea, after the 2009 World Baseball Classic championship|2009 Japan-South Korea final.

<ref name="yomiuri 20230321">{{Cite news|title=ＷＢＣ侍ジャパン、テレビ視聴率も快進撃…韓国戦とイタリア戦で歴代最高２度更新|date=March 22, 2023|work=Yomiuri Shimbun|url=https://www.yomiuri.co.jp/sports/wbc/20230321-OYT1T50188/}}</ref>
<ref name="mynavi 20230323">{{Cite news|title=テレ朝『WBC』決勝、推計5400万人視聴 大会全体では夜放送の準々決勝が最高記録|date=March 23, 2023|work=My Navi News|url=https://news.mynavi.jp/article/20230323-2634027/}}</ref>

<ref name="front office sports 20230317"/> Rating indicated that 62.343 million Japanese watched at least one minute of the game.<ref name="Phile Web">{{Cite news|title=WBC日本戦のリアルタイム視聴者数は推計9446.2万人。最も見られたのは決勝ではなく韓国戦|date=March 23, 2023|last=松永達矢|work=Phile Web|url=https://www.phileweb.com/news/d-av/202303/23/57755.html|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20230325194917/https://www.phileweb.com/news/d-av/202303/23/57755.html|archivedate=March 25, 2023}}</ref>
<ref name="Oricon News">{{Cite news|title=WBC日本戦全7試合 全国で推計9446.2万人が視聴|date=March 23, 2023 |work=Oricon News|url=https://www.oricon.co.jp/news/2272654/full/}}</ref>

<ref name="front office sports 20230317">{{Cite news|title=World Baseball Classic Setting Records For Viewership, Attendance
|date=March 17, 2023|last=McCarthy|first=Michael |work=Front Office Sports|url=https://frontofficesports.com/world-baseball-classic-setting-records-for-viewership-attendance/}}</ref>

sentences.text: In the United States, the World Baseball Classic was carried by Fox Sports for the first time, with games split among six Fox networks. The championship game drew 5.2 million average viewers in the US, peaking at 6.5 million viewers in the final 15 minutes, a new American record for a WBC game.

references.text: <ref name="nyp32223">{{Cite web |url=https://nypost.com/2023/03/22/world-baseball-classic-championship-ratings-make-massive-jump-from-2017/ |title=World Baseball Classic championship ratings make massive jump from 2017 |date=March 23, 2023 |access-date=March 25, 2023 |archive-date=March 23, 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230323030053/https://nypost.com/2023/03/22/world-baseball-classic-championship-ratings-make-massive-jump-from-2017/ |url-status=live }}</ref>
